mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QA WHERE QA_STATUS = 'I' OR QA_STATUS ='E'

SELECT ROWNUM, X.* FROM(SELECT Q.QA_NO ,Q.QA_SDATE ,Q.QA_EDATE ,Q.QA_UDATE ,Q.QA_DDATE ,Q.QA_STATUS ,Q.QA_TITLE ,Q.QA_CONTENT ,E.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NO ,Q.EMP_NO AS NUM
FROM QA Q
JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = Q.EMP_NO WHERE Q.QA_STATUS = 'I' OR Q.QA_STATUS = 'E' ORDER BY Q.QA_NO )X ORDER BY QA_NO DESC

SELECT count(ROWNUM) FROM(SELECT Q.QA_NO ,Q.QA_SDATE ,Q.QA_EDATE ,Q.QA_UDATE ,Q.QA_DDATE ,Q.QA_STATUS ,Q.QA_TITLE ,Q.QA_CONTENT ,E.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NO ,Q.EMP_NO AS NUM ,QP.EMP_NO AS UNO
FROM QA Q
JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = Q.EMP_NO JOIN QA_PARTICIPATION QP ON QP.QA_NO = Q.QA_NO WHERE Q.QA_STATUS = 'I' AND QP.EMP_NO = #{no}
ORDER BY Q.QA_NO )X ORDER BY QA_NO DESC

mapper.select: SELECT Q.QA_NO ,Q.QA_SDATE ,Q.QA_EDATE ,Q.QA_UDATE ,Q.QA_DDATE ,Q.QA_STATUS ,Q.QA_TITLE ,Q.QA_CONTENT ,E.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NO FROM QA Q JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = Q.EMP_NO WHERE Q.QA_NO =#{pno}

SELECT QP.QAPT_NO ,QP.EMP_NO ,QP.QA_NO ,QP.QAPT_DATE ,QP.QAPT_EDIT ,QP.QAPT_STATUS ,E.EMP_NAME ,D.DEPT_NAME FROM QA_PARTICIPATION QP JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = QP.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPT_NO = E.DEPT_NO WHERE QA_NO =#{pno}

SELECT QW.QAAW_NO ,QW.QA_NO ,QW.QACG_NO ,QW.EMP_NO ,QW.QAAW_CONTENT ,E.EMP_NAME ,D.DEPT_NAME FROM QA_ANSWER QW JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = QW.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPT_NO = E.DEPT_NO WHERE QW.QA_NO=#{pno} ORDER BY QW.QAAW_NO DESC
